about_the_game:
KILL THE MONSTERS. LEVEL UP AND COLLECT ITEMS THAT UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTER. UNLOCK NEW CHARACTERS. BRING 3 FRIENDS SO YOU CAN ALL KILL EACHOTHER WITH THE POWDER KEG. COMPLAIN THAT THE POWDER KEG DOES TOO MUCH TEAM DAMAGE. I'M NOT GOING TO CHANGE THAT.

Things in the game

  • Over 50+ items that uniquely upgrade your character
  • Over 10+ Characters with unique weapons and stats that can be unlocked
  • Explore many areas, seek out secrets and items
  • Survive as long as you can against the increasingly powerful horde of monsters
  • Collect coins to spend on permanent upgrades that persist between runs
  • Listen to the electric soundtrack featuring tracks from doopdee

Controllers are recommended for playing local multiplayer on one machine, unless you and your friends can fit four hands on one keyboard.

For online remote play, I tested with my friends and we were able to comfortably play all 4 players with inputs into the hosts keyboard. But controllers also work too.
detailed_description:
KILL THE MONSTERS. LEVEL UP AND COLLECT ITEMS THAT UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTER. UNLOCK NEW CHARACTERS. BRING 3 FRIENDS SO YOU CAN ALL KILL EACHOTHER WITH THE POWDER KEG. COMPLAIN THAT THE POWDER KEG DOES TOO MUCH TEAM DAMAGE. I'M NOT GOING TO CHANGE THAT.

Things in the game

  • Over 50+ items that uniquely upgrade your character
  • Over 10+ Characters with unique weapons and stats that can be unlocked
  • Explore many areas, seek out secrets and items
  • Survive as long as you can against the increasingly powerful horde of monsters
  • Collect coins to spend on permanent upgrades that persist between runs
  • Listen to the electric soundtrack featuring tracks from doopdee

Controllers are recommended for playing local multiplayer on one machine, unless you and your friends can fit four hands on one keyboard.

For online remote play, I tested with my friends and we were able to comfortably play all 4 players with inputs into the hosts keyboard. But controllers also work too.
name: MONSTER GRINDER ULTRA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4.00GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 4GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game should run fine on potato PCs. Although collecting 100+ items and surviving past 60+ minutes may cause a slightly lowered average FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: GRIND THE MONSTERS (NO LORE NO FUSS JUST GET STRAIGHT TO KILLING!) BRING YOUR FRIENDS! GRINDTHE MONSTERS KILL KILL KILL KILL KILL KILL KILL KILL KILL KILL KILL KILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILLKILL
